Format x24 - 24 bit(s) 0
AE_ABS64 00100111 1000 0100
ae_fld_arth_v 3210
ae_fld_arth_v1 3210

Assembler Syntax

AE_ABS64 aed0..15(ae_arth_v), aed0..15(ae_arth_v1)

C Syntax

#include <xtensa/tie/xt_hifi2.h>

extern ae_int64 AE_ABS64(ae_int64 d0);

Description

AE_ABS64 is a 64-bit absolute value of AE_DR register d0, with result placed in d.

Implementation Pipeline

In Out
ae_arth_v1 Mstage ae_arth_v Mstage

Protos that use AE_ABS64

proto AE_ABS64 { out ae_int64 d, in ae_int64 d0 }{}{
AE_ABS64 d, d0;
}
proto AE_ABSQ56 { out ae_q56s d, in ae_q56s d0 }{}{
AE_ABS64 d, d0;
}
